text: Riccardo Fabbriconi (born 10 February 2003), known by his stage name Blanco (written as "BLANCO"), is an Italian singer. He won the 72nd Sanremo Music Festival alongside Mahmood. Mahmood and Blanco both represented Italy at the Eurovision Song Contest 2022 with the song "Brividi". They finished 6th out of 25 entries. == References == Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Italian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Brescia Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: Blanco (singer)
